text: The Yangon Stock Exchange (; abbreviated YSX) The stock exchange opened on December 2015, at the former Central Bank of Myanmar and Myawaddy Bank headquarters in Yangon. On 23 December 2014, two Japanese firms, Daiwa Institute of Research, the research arm of Daiwa Securities Group and Japan Exchange Group, established a joint venture with the state-owned Myanma Economic Bank to establish this stock exchange. The joint venture firm, the Yangon Stock Exchange-Joint Venture Limited will have a working capital of . The Securities and Exchange Commission has selected Kanbawza Bank to be YSX' settlement bank. ==Building history== Rangoon branch of the Reserve Bank of India The YSX building, located on the corner of Sule Pagoda Road and Merchant Street, formerly housed the Central Bank of Myanmar. The neoclassical structure was designed by G Douglas Smart, and opened in 1939, as the Rangoon branch of the Reserve Bank of India, and managed British Burma's financial system, even after its separation from British India in 1937. Following monetary independence from Britain, the building became home to the Union Bank of Burma (ပြည်တောင်စုဘဏ်), and the first Burmese kyats were issued there in July 1952. It remained the site of Myanmar's central bank until 1993, when it became occupied by the military-owned Myawaddy Bank. ==Listed Companies== There are currently 6 campanies Listed on the Stock Exchange. {| class='wikitable sortable' style='width:100%' !Code !Listing Date !Company Name !Industry !Foundation !ISIN |- | 00001 | 2016-03-25 | First Myanmar Investment | real estate industry investment company | 1992-07-03https://ysx-mm.com/listing/company/lc00001/ | MM0000100006 |- | 00002 | 2016-05-20 | Myanmar Thilawa SEZ Holdings Public Limited | real estate developmenthttps://www.msecmyanmar.com/wp- content/uploads/2016/05/cp_00002_en_06052016_01.pdf | 2013-05-03 | MM0000200004 |- | 00003 | 2016-08-26 | Myanmar Citizens Bank Ltd | banking industry | 1991-10-30 | MM0000300002https://ysx- mm.com/listing/company/lc00003/ |- | 00004 | 2017-01-20 | First Private Bank Limited | commercial banking industry | 1991-09-09 | MM0000400000https://ysx- mm.com/listing/company/lc00004/ |- | 00005 | 2018-01-26 | TMH Telecom Public | telecommunications industry | 2007-08-21https://www.tmhtelecom.com/profile/ | MM0000500007https://ysx-mm.com/listing/company/lc00005/ |- | 00006 | 2020-05-28 | Ever Flow River Group | logisticshttps://ysx- mm.com/listing/company/lc00006/ | 2014-04-10 | MM0000600005 |} ==See also== *Rangoon Stock Exchange *Myanmar Securities Exchange Centre ==References== Category:Economy of Myanmar Category:Stock exchanges in Asia Category:Economy of Yangon Category:Daiwa Securities Group Category:Japan Exchange Group Category:Stock exchanges in Southeast Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Yangon Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1939
